Description: Fragment of Clazomenian black-figure painted pottery broad amphoran (Urla Group). Three nude figures dancing to left, central figure bearded.
Curator's comments: Perhaps from the same vase as CVA British Museum Pl. GB 592,1-2. Cook (CVA BM 8, p. 26) suggests that the sherd may join B115.8 (BM GR 1888,0208.76.b, 1888,0208.108, 1888,0208.109, 1888,0208.113d)
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B125.7)
CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 592, 1-2)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 163)
